## FilterAutocompleteResponse.sections property

Represents autocomplete results separated by field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sections: {
        label: string;
        results: AutocompleteResult[];
    }[];
```

## Remarks

This array will only be populated if sectioned is true.
